default.Instructions:
üìù Quick Tips:

‚Ä¢ 'Use Input' takes text from input node
‚Ä¢ 'Use Prompt' uses text from prompt box (input node won't run)

‚Ä¢ Prompt saves only if 'Save Name' is filled
‚Ä¢ Saving to an existing name overwrites it

‚Ä¢ Use 'List' dropdown to select prompt lists
‚Ä¢ Manage lists with the Prompt Stash Manager node

‚Ä¢ For real-time editing, use Prompt Stash Passthrough node with 'Pause to Edit'
‚Ä¢ If workflow closes while paused, use 'Clear Paused' in Manager node

‚Ä¢ Saved prompts persist between sessions
‚Ä¢ All nodes share the same prompt library
default.ManageLists:
üìÇ Managing Prompt Lists:

‚Ä¢ Use the Prompt Stash Manager node to add or delete prompt lists
‚Ä¢ 'Add' creates a new list named in 'New List Name'
‚Ä¢ 'Delete' removes the selected list from 'Existing Lists'
‚Ä¢ Cannot delete the last remaining list
‚Ä¢ 'Clear Paused' resets any stuck pause states

‚Ä¢ Organize prompts into categories using lists
‚Ä¢ Switch between lists in the Prompt Stash Saver node using the 'List' dropdown
default.negative_demo: worst quality, bad anatomy, text, error, jpeg artifacts, blurry

characters.wizard: elderly wizard with long white beard, wearing blue robes with stars
characters.warrior: strong warrior wearing plate armor, battle-scarred, determined expression

backgrounds.forest: dense forest, tall trees, dappled sunlight, misty atmosphere
